critique: This document primarily concerns the reorganization and consolidation of river basin commissions. It shifts responsibilities and resources from the Souris-Red-Rainy River Basins Commission to the Upper Mississippi River Basin Commission, expanding the latter's jurisdiction. There's a focus on inter-state coordination and consultation, as well as international coordination with Canada through the International Joint Commission. The document doesn't directly address typical ideological divides but rather focuses on administrative efficiency and resource management.
